Title: Descendants: The Rise of Red
Writer: Sara Parriott, Josann McGibbon, Dan Frey
Actors: Kylie Cantrall, Malia Baker, Dara Reneé
Plot: Follows Red, daughter of the Queen of Hearts, and Chloe, daughter of Cinderella, as they team up to save Auradon by traveling back in time using the White Rabbit's pocket watch, to stop an event that would cause grave consequences.
